messages.content: What is the purpose of the Flux Prompt Saver node?
The Flux Prompt Saver node saves images with metadata from the Flux Sampler Parameters pipeline.
How does the Flux Prompt Saver node handle model names?
The Flux Prompt Saver node uses checkpoint selection for model names.
What information does the Flux Prompt Saver node combine in the metadata?
The Flux Prompt Saver node combines sampler and scheduler information in the metadata.
What are the dependencies of the Flux Prompt Saver node?
The Flux Prompt Saver node requires the Flux Sampler Parameters node from the ComfyUI Essentials package.
How is the Flux Prompt Saver node installed?
To install the Flux Prompt Saver node: 1. Navigate to your ComfyUI custom nodes directory. 2. Clone the repository. 3. Restart ComfyUI and refresh.
Can you provide an example workflow for the Flux Prompt Saver node?
An example workflow is included in the repository to demonstrate the usage of the Flux Prompt Saver node.
What are the requirements for using the example workflow?
To use the example workflow: 1. Install the required custom nodes. 2. Restart ComfyUI and refresh your browser window. 3. Load the workflow by dragging and dropping the image file into ComfyUI.
